alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 12:50PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Harney County and Malheur County. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Tuesday to 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and difficult driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest accumulations are expected across the northern half of Harney and Malheur Counties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
